RelatedSentence: A new bill proposed in North Carolina would make it a felony offense for first responders , doctors , or public safety officials to disclose the ingredients of fracking fluid .

Fracking fluid is the mix of chemicals used in hydraulic fracturing , a process used by the oil and gas industry to break apart underground shale rock formations , releasing the fossil fuels held inside .

A0: first responders , doctors , or public safety officials
RelatedSentence: First responders found guilty of disclosing the contents of fracking fluid face jail time and heavy fines under the proposed legislation .
